suncertify.db
Interface Engine

public interface Engine

Defines an engine for managing the access to a single database file data through sessions.

An instance of this interface can be an engine managing the access to a local database file exist in same caller JVM file system or a proxy for a remote engine exist in another remote JVM which manages the access to a database file exists in that JVM.

Method getDBSchema() returns a description for the record structure for the database file managed by this engine.

Session is the unique access point to manipulate a database file data which can be created by calling newSession()

Calling shutdown() will result in stopping the engine from accepting any new clients, discarding all sessions already attached to it, and free any resources maintained by this engine. Shutting down an engine, by local or remote engine clients, is not controlled by this API, the caller for this API shall manages this.

Author:
Mohammad S. Abdellatif
See Also:
Session, EngineService

          Returns the magic cookie which is the unique identify for a database file type.

          Returns true if this engine instance is down, otherwise false.

          Creates a new unique session which represents a unique access to database file managed by this engine instance.
 void shutdown()
          Shutdown engine and automatically discard any sessions attached to it and release the lock over database file.
 

Method Detail

getDatabaseMagicCookie

int getDatabaseMagicCookie()
Returns the magic cookie which is the unique identify for a database file type.

A database file which stores the contractors information has its unique cookie differ form a database file which stores an inventory data.

Returns:
wrapped file magic cookie.

getDBSchema

Schema getDBSchema()
Gets the descriptor for database file record structure.

An IllegalStateException will be thrown if the engine is down.

Returns:
database file record structure definition.

newSession

Session newSession()
Creates a new unique session which represents a unique access to database file managed by this engine instance.

An IllegalStateException will be thrown if the engine was shutdown.

Returns:
new unique access.

shutdown

void shutdown()
Shutdown engine and automatically discard any sessions attached to it and release the lock over database file.

Shutting down an engine by local or remote caller must be controlled by API caller.

isDown

boolean isDown()
Returns true if this engine instance is down, otherwise false.

Returns:
returns true if engine is down, otherwise false.
